articles.title: Firozabad: Health officer suspended, clinics of unauthorised practitioners sealed amid dengue outbreak - India Today
articles.description: The UP government on Friday suspended health officer of the municipal corporation and sealed clinics of unauthorised medical practitioners in Firozabad as the district battles dengue and viral fever outbreak.

articles.description: After operating for 25 years in India, American auto major Ford Motor Co has decided to pull the plug on local manufacturing. The US automaker said that it would "take a hit of about $2 billion as it does not see a path to profitability in India."
